lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Why did Moses run away from Egypt?
answers: He killed an Egyptian who beat an Israelite; Pharaoh wanted him dead
He wanted to explore new lands

questions.text: Where did Moses run away to?
What special thing did Moses see 40 years later?
answers: A bush that wouldn't burn up

questions.text: Who spoke to Moses from inside the burning bush?
What message did God have for Moses?
answers: I'm sending you to bring my people out of Egypt
You should stay here in Midian forever

questions.text: What names did God use for himself?
answers: I Am, The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob
The God of the mountains and seas

questions.text: What miracles did God tell Moses to do in front of the people?
answers: Turn his staff into a snake, heal a disease from his hand, turn water into blood
Call fire down from heaven, make food fall from the sky
Heal the sick, raise the dead, calm storms
Turn stones into bread, walk on water

questions.text: Why did Moses want God to send someone else?
answers: He was afraid of the Israelites

questions.text: Who did God pick to speak for Moses?
In the end, what did Moses do?
